name: Corridor: Amount of Fear
description:
Corridor: Amount of Fear is a psychological horror for one person. The main character enters his brother's house to visit him. The paranormal is sure to scare you. We advise you to get ready before you start playing.

You have to plunge into the atmosphere of the game - a mysterious house.

The game has many features:

  • Unreal Immersion: Realism of sounds and graphics just won't leave you indifferent. Minimum interface and maximum gameplay.
  • Game Mechanics: You can interact with almost every item you see. The surroundings will not make you bored.
  • History: Investigate the history of a mysterious house in which the corridor is constantly changing.
  • AI: We are not going to praise our artificial intelligence, just say that it is present and will surely scare you..
